{"step_by_step_thinking": "Prostaglandins are synthesized from polyunsaturated fatty acids. According to the documents, prostaglandins are derived enzymatically from the fatty acid arachidonic acid, which is a polyunsaturated fatty acid. The conversion of arachidonic acid to prostaglandins involves the action of cyclooxygenase enzymes. Therefore, the correct answer is C. Polyunsaturated fatty acids.", "answer_choice": "C"}
